author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

MahiDebugger example config, cfi, and plotting script so that it "just runs".

#### PR validation:

Used for an early look at HCAL reconstructed hits from pilot beam test (HCAL not timed in yet): 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1311783/142014929-2d292941-5397-4ed0-b430-42a4073b7717.png)
title: MahiDebugger Run 3 config
